name: Gravity Gear
description:
Tap left or right side of the screen of you mobile device to rotate the gears. You need to avoid the traps and get the ball to the finish point. First levels are simple, but the game become more challenging with each level. Some levels are a bit hardcore, some levels looks like a puzzle, but all of them was tested for completion.

List of my other android-projects here: https://kriopeg.ru
